4.text: Saumya, Sahan and their parents are in Kandy to see the Kandy Perahera. Mother: Saumya, Sahan, look! The Perahera is about to begin. Sahan: Let's go to the front, so that we can see better. Father: Look at the whip-crackers and the fireball acrobats leading the way. There are many of them now. There were fewer of them a few years ago.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saumja'>Saumya</phoneme>, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme> and their parents are in Kandy to see the Kandy Perahera. Mother: <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saumja'>Saumya</phoneme>, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme>, look! The Perahera is about to begin. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme>: Let's go to the front, so that we can see better. Father: Look at the whip-crackers and the fireball acrobats leading the way. There are many of them now. There were fewer of them a few years ago.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Sahan: Father, don't you think that there will be more in the future? Mother: You never know. Saumya: Look! There's a beautifully decorated baby elephant. Sahan: Oh! I missed it. Father: Don't worry. There will be more. Sahan: Saumya, there's a majestic tusker coming this way. What is it carrying on its back? Mother: It's the sacred Tooth Relic of Lord Buddha.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme>: Father, don't you think that there will be more in the future? Mother: You never know. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saumja'>Saumya</phoneme>: Look! There's a beautifully decorated baby elephant. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme>: Oh! I missed it. Father: Don't worry. There will be more. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme>: <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saumja'>Saumya</phoneme>, there's a majestic tusker coming this way. What is it carrying on its back? Mother: It's the sacred Tooth Relic of Lord Buddha.</prosody></speak>
